school: Civil Engineering School, Mech & Mine Engineering School, Civil Engineering School, Mech & Mine Engineering School
description: Project or thesis on a topic relevant to the School's research profile & the student's field of engineering study. Students commencing a year long project in sem 1 enrol in ENGG7241 in sem 1 & sem 2; students commencing a year long project in sem 2 enrol in ENGG7242 in sem 2 & the following sem 1; students completing the course in a single semester enrol in ENGG7240. For information about how to find a project and supervisor, and enrol in this course, please visit http://www.mechmining.uq.edu.au/mengsc-thesis
